name: Driven By Habits Mixtape bonus Version By Pyrex Plat
description:
Streets Academy Entertainment Presents Pyrex Plat Mix Tape: 
(Driven By Habits) He Is Bringing You An Incredible Real Life Story,With his Hard And Aggressive Attention Grabbing Voice. Rapping about his life, Growing Up In The Streets Along With Party Music And Love Songs For The Ladies.This Mix Tape Will Give You Insight About Pyrex Plat's Everyday Life. He Speaks On Everything From Losing His Family,Relationships,Drugs,Running The Streets,Partying And Everyday Life Trials And Tribulations. This CD Brings You 19 Tracks Of Pure Realness. Buy It And Enjoy This Bonus Version With Tracks Thats Sure To Leave You Wanting More.
